displaytitle: Sketch for an Adoration of the Sheperds
medium: Brush and cream, black, dark brown and dark red oil paint on yellow-gray prepared paper
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
inscribed:
Inscribed recto, lower left, in brown ink: partial
and indecipherable inscription; inscribed verso,
across bottom, in brown ink (in different hands):
Ducaden [?] Giacomo [very faint] Tintoretto;
I Tintoretto; 40 40

titles.title: Sketch for an Adoration of the Sheperds

bibliography.boilertext: Hans Tietze and E. Tietze-Conrat, The Drawings of the Venetian Painters in the 15th and 16th Centuries (New York: J.J. Augustin Publisher, 1944).
bibliography.citation:
Hans Tietze and E. Tietze-Conrat, The Drawings of the Venetian Painters in the 15th and 16th Centuries (New York: J.J. Augustin Publisher, 1944).
, no. 1555

bibliography.boilertext: Laura Giles, Lia Markey, Claire Van Cleave, et. al., Italian Master Drawings from the Princeton University Art Museum, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Art Museum, 2014).
bibliography.citation: Laura Giles, Lia Markey, Claire Van Cleave, et. al., Italian Master Drawings from the Princeton University Art Museum, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Art Museum, 2014)., p. 121, cat. no. 50; p. 123 (illus.)

bibliography.boilertext: Felton Gibbons, Catalogue of Italian Drawings in The Art Museum, Princeton University, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1977).
bibliography.citation: Felton Gibbons, Catalogue of Italian Drawings in The Art Museum, Princeton University, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1977)., Vol. 1: pp. 209-210, no. 687 (illustrated in Vol. 2 under the same catalog number)

caption: Domenico Tintoretto (Italian, 1560–1635), Sketch for an Adoration of the Sheperds. Brush and cream, black, dark brown and dark red oil paint on yellow-gray prepared paper; 38.4 × 19.8 cm, 54.6 × 42.1 × 3.5 cm (frame). Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1948-1920)
